Fellow, Ethiopian Orthopedic Association & AO Alliance
Advanced training in joint preservation, arthroscopy, and regenerative therapies

items.detail: Dr. Selamawit Bekele founded BoneCare Clinic after completing orthopedic residency at Addis Ababa University and fellowship training in Cape Town.

Designated by the Ethiopian Orthopedic Association as a centre of excellence for minimally invasive spine and joint procedures.
